div.div: Love is an important part of children and adults. It is clear the importance of being valued in our society and others. We should provide to abandoned and orphan children the sense of care as a parent would do with their own children. The children should feel every day that they can count on someone that spend part of their time with them. Projects should provide the love to overcome the impact of not having their parents close and a reference for them to be able to love others. They should supply staff or external people and should train care givers to overcome the extensive work of the shelter in order to provide enough love to the children.
